title: Melania Trump wears suit at State of the Union
shortDescription: First lady Melania Trump, in a dark suit and heels, chose not to break from tradition with a simple fashion choice at the State of the Union address.

title: Barron Trump makes first public appearance since father's inauguration

title: President Trump delivers his State of the Union address
shortDescription: The address is required by the Constitution. It directs the president to keep lawmakers informed about the state of the nation and propose legislative priorities.

title: Trumps get okay for Irish golf ballroom but must help protect snails
shortDescription: Trump International Golf Club on the west coast of Ireland is trying to build a ballroom for 320 guests.

title: Let's play 2026 State of the Union bingo. What will Trump say?

title: 30 lawmakers skipping Trump address for 'People's State of the Union'
shortDescription: Dozens of lawmakers and activists will attend a 'People's State of the Union' event, livestreamed as a counter to Trump's address.

title: Trump called SCOTUS ruling on his tariffs a ‘disgrace’
shortDescription: SCOTUS’ tariff ruling could be a signal that the court may push back on some of Trump’s other executive orders, including birthright citizenship.

title: 61% say Trump is 'erratic with age,' according to Reuters/Ipsos poll

title: Who is Mike Johnson? House Speaker set for State of the Union
shortDescription: House Speaker Mike Johnson will usher President Trump's address to a joint session of Congress on Feb. 24.

title: State of the Union live updates: Trump says 'our nation is back'
shortDescription: The speech could be Trump's last to a GOP-controlled Congress as Democrats look to re-take the House of Representatives in November.

title: Bill Maher jokingly calls for end to State of the Union address
shortDescription: Bill Maher compared the State of the Union address to a king's speech. But the address is here to stay, thanks to the Constitution.

title: Robert De Niro headlines 'State of the Swamp' counter-address to Trump's SOTU
